content.question: Brown uses evidence that “captives could be retained to swell armies and enlarge retinues or be sold to Europeans for goods and more guns” to support the claim that the Atlantic slave trade

choices.label: made European colonial powers significantly wealthier
increased violence between rival West African peoples
helped stateless societies to protect themselves from West African slaving regimes
provided the most important factor for producing goods in Europe’s American colonies

content.answer: increased violence between rival West African peoples

topic.text: 2.3: Capture and the Impact of the Slave Trade on West African Societies

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
